sentence.Network_en: The color of unilocular adipose tissue varies from white to dark yellow.
sentence.Network_cn: 单房性脂肪组织的颜色从白色到暗黄色不等.

sentence.Network_en: White fat is partitioned by septa of loose connective tissue into clusters of adipose cells.
sentence.Network_cn: 白色脂肪被疏松结缔组织隔膜分隔成脂肪细胞群.

sentence.Network_en: The fatty acids cross the following layers in passing from the endothelium into the adipose cell.
sentence.Network_cn: 脂肪酸从通过血管内皮到进入脂肪细胞要通过以下几层.
